name: _WaybillLineItem
description: Information from AWB Rate Description section as per bullet point 18 - data elements 22A - 22Z from AWB

columns.name: _chargeableWeightForRate
columns.description: Chargeable weight for which the rate description details apply

columns.name: _dimensionsForRate
columns.description: Information about the Dimensions used for the rate descbribed by the Line Item

columns.name: _grossWeightForRate
columns.description: Gross weight for which the rate description details apply

columns.name: _hsCodeForRate
columns.description: Harmonized Commodity code; refer to hsType used. 6 minimum digits are expected.

columns.name: _productionCountryForRate
columns.description: Production country for the rate described by this Line Item. Refer ISO 3166-2

columns.name: _rateCharge
columns.description: TACT Rate for rate description details

columns.name: _rateClassCode
columns.description: Rate class code e.g. Q. Refer to CXML Code List 1.4 Rate Class Codes

columns.name: _rateClassCodeBasic
columns.description: Rate Surcharge/Reduction - Basic Rate Class Code

columns.name: _ratePercentage
columns.description: Rate Surcharge/Reduction - Percebtage of  red. / surcharge

columns.name: _rcp
columns.description: IATA 3-letter city code of the rate combination point as defined in TACT

columns.name: _uldOwnerCode
columns.description: Information about the ULD owner code described in a ULD specific piece or used for a rate in a Line Item

columns.name: _uldRateClassType
columns.description: ULD Rate information - ULD Rate Class Type

columns.name: _uldTareWeightForRate
columns.description: Information about the ULD tare weight used for the rate descbribed by the Line Item

columns.name: _uldType
columns.description: Type of ULD as per IATA ULD Regulation

columns.name: _volumetricWeightForRate
columns.description: Volumetric weight used for the rate described by this line item

columns.name: _commodityItemNumberForRate
columns.description: Indicates the specific commodity on which the rate class code is applied

columns.name: _goodsDescriptionForRate
columns.description: Goods description used in the rate described by the Line Item

columns.name: _lineItemNumber
columns.description: Number of the line item

columns.name: _pieceCountForRate
columns.description: Number of pieces for which the rate description details apply

columns.name: _slacForRate
columns.description: Slac used for the rate described by the Line item

columns.name: _uldSerialNumber
columns.description: Serial number that allows to uniquely identify the ULD
